page.title: 11FARM SURVEY page 2
page.content: {Winson Farm}- Is a farm of 186 acres,with 14 pasture fields .Two fields are used for growing crops other than grass, and 10 fields are used for hay and silage. They grow potatoes, wheat, oats, swede,and rye-6 acres .They also grow 17 acres of barley and pea mixture under sown with grass for silage,and 15 acres of barley under sown with grass for silage.They have 4 acres of turnips and 5 acres of fodder beet. {Animals}-They have 86 milking cows , 52 breeding heifers under two years , and 22 up to three years old in calf . {Machinery }-They have 3 tractors , silage wagon, a harrow mower, a yard scrape, a dung spreader, a hay turner, a front end loader, a manure distributar, and a trailer. {Workers 2 full time and 2 part time workers
